roleset.name: clean or maintain a house, maintaining of a house
roleset.note: HOUSEKEEP-V NOTES: Based on temprel data. Comparison to housekeeping.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from housekeep.01-v)

example.name: Keeping up a literal house
example.text: She needs assistance making meals PRO housekeeping and with toileting

example.name: Arg 1 often relates to the computer domain
example.text: GSD should not housekeep the thumbnails.

example.name: One more with arg 1
example.text: This agent will housekeep the mail database for all mail documents
example.arg: the mail database for all mail documents
